title: Please set ranked games to loss prevented for ~11:00 am EST 06/31/15
body:
Please set ranked games to loss prevented for ~11:00 am EST 06/30/15 as there were massive crashes or DC's which made almost all games unfair.

Also reverse the leaving penalty and lp loss

**Edit:  06/30/15 not 06/31**

Thank you,

replies.body: We all are. Keep bumping the threads till riot takes notice. If we all band together so riot notices hopefully leaverbuster will not ban our accounts
I already got a lower queue priority for the next 5 games purely because of this DCing issue. It's really unfair that I get the same penalties as an AFK/leaver due to _server issues on Riot's part._
It is amazing that we are now thirty minutes in and Riot hasn't even posted an _advisory_.  ZERO action.  This is totally unacceptable.  And yes, I _pay_ for this game.
I would love to up vote this 100 times, but I guess my one will have to do.
There are not enough up votes.

Is there still issues with connecting to games at this time?  We should have fixed the "cannot connect to game" error but there should be pretty bad ping due to the route we had to switch to until the fiber break is fixed.  If you are not able to start a custom game can you post your ISP and Area so we can start to track this down?
Also Phoenix Arizona with Century Link

The fiber cut issue is still being worked on at this time, three enclosures were damaged impacting three different carriers, unfortunately we do not have an ETR.
how about loss prevented for us?  That will be a start then an ETR in the near future.  Please

I'm still not understanding why something that happened 3 days ago just now started affecting my ability to connect to games today, starting 8 hours ago. Apparently many others experienced this sudden change too. I am doubting it has anything to do with Portland considering the only affect it had is very isolated - I just can't load a League game. I can do literally everything else and have zero lag.

I've climbed b5 4 times now - hows it fair that because of riots flaws on their janky cables in Portland can rid me of this achievement? I now got leaver buster and have low priority 5 min que time for idk how many games - demoted to b5. like riot. RIOT....... REALLY?
My point being i should not have to lose RANKED games because riot failed.
I totally agree!  Activate the loss prevention.  This is NOT the user's problem!  This is Riot's problem!  I got demoted and an upset about this.  If i get demoted, I'd rather it be my fault.

Okay so from what I understand from the replies to this thread, is that most players that are affected are on century link.  I can confirm that one of the main outages we are dealing with is the Century Link route, so I don't think this will be resolved until they are able to fix their fiber break unfortunately.
Then how come other games work? Why does your client work until we try to load up a game?

The other games you are playing aren't hosted in the same place as Riots. It's a fibre link that runs somewhere between you, and Riot's data centre. Even though it isn't Riot's cable, it can still seriously affect Riot and anyone else hosting things in the same area.
Then how come their client is working, but not the games? You never answered that part :/
I can connect to a custom game now but no compensation for the ranked games I was kicked out from or never connected to. I'm now with a leaverbuster record and 0 LP.
Silly bear.  Riot doesn't care about you.
Another add to this vote... seriously lame how many people are getting disconnected

I agree completely I was booted out of my game, I was carrying my team and it was an easy win for the enemy since I got booted.

Plus, I lost LP and got reported.

Tempe, AZ with Centurylink. I just got leaverbuster for not being able to connect to a game. Same kind of error that everyone else is getting. I tried connecting multiple times, and it just stays at the same error message after champ select.

I was playing a ranked match this morning(8am) when this issue started happening, I got disconnected and put on a 5min low priority queue. 9 hours later after work I try to log on (still on low priority) and start a norms thinking it could've been my computer or something this morning. Nope! Wasn't able to reconnect and most likely 20min queue ahead of me. I'm not upset that I can't play LoL I can wait a few days even, but Riot you should not be punishing our accounts with leave buster and loss of lp for something that we cannot control {{item:3070}}

Riot never does anything about the bs. I am stuck in bronze because i win 1 game get 15 lp, then get an afk on my team ad loose 25 lp. WTF is that? Ranked is broken...but all they care about is new skins and new champs. Ways for them to make more money. If they dont fix the broken ranked system soon they will loose a lot of loyal players. Ive been a loyal LoL player for a long time and spent a ton of money on skins. The broken ranked system already has me looking into Heroes of the storm and Dota....

LOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOOL Thats a new one gotta admit, I have never heard Rito blamed soley for being in Bronze

but yea fuck the lag i got low priority cuz they fucked up
Bump. I also received a couple losses because of this "unable to connect" issue. Loss prevented, please.
Legit, i think they are just gonna wait until all of this just dies out lol
Tired of the lazy way riot punishes people.  This incident with leaverbuster is yet another example of why auto punishing people doesn't work.

Amen brother.  A thousand times amen.  Also, after an hour of nothing, their post in the server status that sloppily indicates that their customers are at fault for playing is just orders of magnitude dumb.
Agreed, I am in a game  currently and cannot connect to it.
They won't say anything, they'll ignore our posts and move on.

I would also like for my leaving penalty to be reversed, I had to go to a third party site to figure out that my game had started. I also was disconnecting for seconds at a time while I tried to play the game.
